actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Government Management, Information and Technology.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Government Management, Information and Technology

official_title: To amend the Inspector General Act of 1978 to establish an Office of Inspector General Oversight Council.
short_title: Office of Inspector General Oversight Council Act of 1999

summary.text: Office of Inspector General Oversight Council Act of 1999 - Amends the Inspector General Act of 1978 to establish an Office of Inspector General Oversight Council as an independent establishment in the executive branch to oversee and review the actions and activities of the Offices of Inspector General of establishments and designated Federal entities.

titles.title: Office of Inspector General Oversight Council Act of 1999
To amend the Inspector General Act of 1978 to establish an Office of Inspector General Oversight Council.
